message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe could be of significant value to you. While I cannot disclose all the details just yet, I can assure you it's worth no less than $1200000 to me. I'm offering it to you at a price of $1500000, which reflects its potential value and my confidence in its benefits for you.  This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know your decision as soon as possible.
